Text: Profitability also has improved over the past decade as the company got larger and more efficient, reflected in its EBITDA margin that increased from levels of about 32% in 2009 to a new record high of near 38% in 2018.
Cause: Profitability also has improved over the past decade as the company got larger and more efficient
Effect: its EBITDA margin that increased from levels of about 32% in 2009 to a new record high of near 38% in 2018.
Sentence: <e1>Profitability also has improved over the past decade as the company got larger and more efficient</e1>, reflected in <e2>its EBITDA margin that increased from levels of about 32% in 2009 to a new record high of near 38% in 2018.</e2>
